Sentencas: Silver-copper oxide reactive air brazes are the most widely used Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) brazes.
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes

Sentencas: However, the conventional Ag-4 wt.% Cu composition has a high wetting angle of similar to 40 degrees in air on yttriastabilized-zirconia (YSZ) that leads to manufacturing defects (denoted as Type I pores).
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes

Sentencas: Also, many elements that oxidize during brazing to promote braze wetting (such as Cu) are easily reduced by SOFC fuels.
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes

Sentencas: This results in Type II pores that decrease the braze interfacial strength and provide a quick path for hydrogen permeation into the braze (where the hydrogen reacts with diffused oxygen to form gaseous water pockets, denoted as Type Ill pores).
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes

Sentencas: The present work demonstrates that transient porous nickel interlayers, instead of reactive element additions, can be used to promote Ag wetting on YSZ and produce high-quality YSZ-stainless steel braze joints.
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes

Sentencas: Mechanical tests on these reactive-element-free, silver based SOFC braze joints, both before and after 500 h of 750 degrees C oxidation in air, show that the braze and braze interface strengths are higher than the underlying YSZ|NiO-YSZ substrate.
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes

Sentencas: The elimination of Type I and Type II porosity enabled by this new technique should result in improved braze lifetimes for SOFC and other ceramic-to-metal sealing applications.
Titulo: Transient porous nickel interlayers for improved silver-based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell brazes
